title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 45.8 - Accredited hospital
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 45.8 - Accredited hospital

State Regulations

Payment for care in hospitals will be made only if the hospital possesses a valid operating certificate from the commissioner if it is located within the State or appears on the Joint Commission on Accreditation of Hospitals list of approved hospitals if it is located out-of-state. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
45.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
